cause.description:
Retail therapy is urgently neccessary. We are students who have been deprived of this necessity for months and we need to counerbalance the last few months, especially the last few weeks! If anyone is interested in assisting us with our fund it would be greatly appreiciated. If you are not interested in donating to our fund would you kindly pass this on so someone else may help us with our cause.
1. from behind
2. on our knees
cause.mission: buy enough for us to satisfy our needs
cause.name: Maria and Hayley's shopping fund
